description: A high-level design guideline file inspired by the provided UI screenshots. The style is clean, modern, and friendly, using soft shadows, generous spacing, and a muted color palette with purposeful accents. This system prioritizes clarity, approachability, and a layered, 'card-based' interface.

designPrinciples.description: All components and layouts must be intuitive and easy to understand. Labels are clear, hierarchy is obvious, and actions are explicit.
Avoid sharp edges and jarring colors. Use generous rounded corners, soft diffused shadows, and a friendly, muted color palette to create a welcoming and non-intimidating user experience.
Use 'cards' and 'modals' as primary content containers. Depth is created with shadows, lifting interactive elements and panels off the light background to establish a clear Z-axis and focus.
Embrace whitespace. Generous padding and margins prevent cognitive overload and help the user focus on the task at hand, whether it's a form or a simple notification.
Use color strategically. The base UI is neutral (black, white, grays), with color reserved for indicating status (success, warning, danger), selection, or calling attention to primary actions.

typography.fontFamily: A clean, geometric sans-serif, such as 'Inter', 'Roboto', or a system-default font stack.

styles.name: Heading (Large)
styles.description: For modal titles like 'Connect bank account'.

styles.name: Label
styles.description: For form field labels like 'Legal first name*'.

styles.name: Body (Default)
styles.description: For descriptive text and form inputs.

styles.name: Caption
styles.description: For helper text or secondary info, like 'You can cancel this request...'.

cardsAndModals.description: The primary container for content and actions.
cardsAndModals.header: Often includes a 'Heading (Large)' and a close 'Icon Button' in the top-right corner.

primary.description: For main actions like 'Go to Dashboard', 'Connect'.

text.description: For tertiary actions, often used as a 'Cancel' link.

iconButton.description: For closing modals or dismissing alerts.

inputFields.description: Base style for text inputs, textareas, and selects.
inputFields.label: Uses 'Label' typography, placed externally above the field.

alerts.structure: Uses a thick (4px) left border, color-coded to the status.
alerts.content: Contains a bolded primary message ('Body (Bold)') and a 'Caption' line for secondary text.

tags.description: Small pills for displaying status or selected items.
tags.structure: Contains text and an optional 'x' icon for removal.

illustrations.style: Modern flat/vector style with minimal strokes and soft gradients.
illustrations.colors: Uses the accent color palette (info, success, warning, danger) in a muted, friendly way.
illustrations.purpose: Used in modals, empty states, or onboarding flows to add visual interest and clarify concepts (e.g., 'Connect bank account').
